mapper.select: select to_char(checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as checkindate,to_char(checkoutdate-1,'yyyy-mm-dd') as checkoutdate from roombk where rno=#{rno}
select to_char(checkindate+1,'yyyy-mm-dd') as checkindate,to_char(checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as checkoutdate from roombk where rno=#{rno}
select count(*) from roombk where id=#{id}

SELECT roombk.price,roombk.rbno,roombk.rno,roombk.rname,roombk.checks,to_char(bookingdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as bookingdate,to_char(checkindate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkindate,to_char(checkoutdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkoutdate FROM (select ROWNUM row_num, rb2.* from (select * from roombk rb where rb.id=#{id} order by rb.rbno desc)rb2) roombk where row_num >= #{paging.startNum} and row_num <= #{paging.endNum}
select count(*) from roombk rb,room r where r.id=#{id} and r.rno=rb.rno

SELECT roombk.rbno,roombk.grade,roombk.rname,roombk.id,roombk.checks,to_char(bookingdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as bookingdate,to_char(checkindate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkindate,to_char(checkoutdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkoutdate FROM (select ROWNUM row_num, rb.* from roombk rb,room r where rb.rno=r.rno and r.id=#{id} order by rb.rbno desc) roombk where row_num >= #{paging.startNum} and row_num <= #{paging.endNum}
select count(*) from mgrade where id=#{id}
select s.* from(select rownum row_num,c.* from (select * from mgrade where id=#{id})c)s where row_num >= #{paging.startNum} and row_num <= #{paging.endNum}
select round(avg(grade),1) from mgrade where id=#{id}
